Emami Navaratna Oil Hair Oil (500 ml) Price: Rs.225

Himani navratan oil is natural oil which is not specified for any problem regarding body or hair but it provides beauty nourishments. This is the result of rare 9 ayurvedic herbs and these herbs has cooling effect and it gives you mental and physical relief from stress
column18: body aches etc. After using this you will get rejuvenation in your mind as well as body. Along with that it stops hair loss.
